id.description: The unique identifier for the report

created_at.description: The date and time at which the report was first initiated

name.description: Report type string identifier. See the “Report Types” section of this documentation

status.description: The current state of the report in the checking process

href.description: The API endpoint to retrieve the report

sub_result.description: The sub_result of the report. It gives a more detailed result for Document reports only, and will be null otherwise

properties.description: The properties associated with the report, if any

breakdown.description: The details of the report. This is specific to each type of report

documents.description: The document IDs that were processed. Only for Document reports

check_id.description: The unique identifier for the check id
